english.segment1: You take my rights away. You take control, no stopping You. You take my rights away. I can take it.
english.segment2: See me let it go. You are in control. Suffer as we grow. And we say - we say we don't want to.
english.segment3: Holding nothing, You take everything. You're worth anything at all. Anything at all.
english.segment5: You define me. with your identity. Lose my life in You. I can take - I'll take what it costs me.
